author: David Gill
comment: I love this face. The green looks fantastic with the black edge of my g watch r. The only thing missing is a battery percentage indicator. As it is, I can swipe down to view the battery, but it would be nice to just have it on the watch face. This is all that separates it from 5 stars for me
title: Great watch face

author: Allan Mcadam
comment: Update: sorry that by no response i meant that when you emailed me and i wrote back, that had no response. And as for refunding. I tried to reinstall it giving you the benefit of the doubt. This apparently hinders refunds. As the product supplier you should vaguely specify what won't work. The gear watch line of devices are for Androids and wearable. But for 1.83$ you argue.WEEKS LATER  NOOO RESPONSE  NOO REFUND! !  DO NOT BUY   I paid for it, it won't install. And I can't refund it (minutes after buying).

reply.author: kopirat
reply.content:
Hi Allan,
Actually I replied almost immediately, unfortunately your device isn't an Android Wear device, so you should probably avoid buying Android Wear apps and expecting them to work (or use the built-in refund option in Google Play instead of leaving a 1 star review). Sorry that you were confused.

title: This won't install

author: Alexander Grenon
comment: The scanning looks incredible and adds a very nice aesthetic touch on my G Watch. The settings are very nice and faithful to the Fallout games (color options being the same from games, etc.) and the fonts are all correct, making it a truly beautiful watch face well worth the price of any fan of the series.
title: Fantastic!

author: Jeffrey Swayze
comment: I love this watchface! Simple yet immersive enough to fit right in with any fallout fans fandom. Maybe think about adding some more customizations for those who want a few more options otherwise this is grade A watchface! :)
title: Perfect on my Moto 360!

comment: A great looking minimalist watch face that draws on the classic aesthetic of Fallout's Pip-Boy that comes in both analog and digital flavors. It's not as busy as some other watch faces that try too hard to emulate the myriad of information the in game provides.

author: Ivan Perez
comment: Would rate higher if worked.. So excited for this, but it's been hours since purchased and it won't show up at all. Can't use or customize. What's going on?
title: So excited for this, but it's been hours since purchased and it won't show up at all. Can't use or customize. What's going on?

author: Kenneth Lawson
comment: Enjoyed your live wallpaper and was happy to find this watch face. Looks elegant on my ZenWatch, and much less expensive than another face that also requires a third party app. Thank you!
title: Very Nice!

author: Christian Brice
comment: It's amazing how close it recreates the theme.  The font is so close but if there were a battery status indicator for phone and watch, and animated pipboy this would be my favorite face ever
title: Perfect but

author: DcDBoii
comment: Do I need a 3rd party launcher? Or how do I upload watch face            (sm-r382)

reply.author: kopirat
reply.content:
Hi Devin,
I can assure you it works and you don't need a 3rd party launcher. It will be installed just like any other Wear app is, sometimes it can take a few minutes to show up on your device. Please consider updating your review once you get it working.

title: Doesn't work

author: Jacob Anderson
comment: I'd give it 5 stars if it had the falling bombs like the pipboy screensaver.

author: William Atkinson
comment: Great app, wish there were more on screen options such as a battery status indicator.

author: Deer Deity
comment: Theres no icon and no settings for the watchface on my watch yet it claims to be highly customizable. I solely bought the watchface with the intention to change it. One star until resolved, unfortunately.
title: How to customize?

author: Jacob Ritenour
comment: Finally a good looking pip-boy watch face only the settings don't seem to change anything.
title: Awesome.

author: Jack Kaiser
comment: Look's great on the Moto 360, some more additions like weather and battery life indicators would be great.

author: Steve Cirelli
comment: There's nothing to this face but green numbers and scan lines. Not worth $1.50.

author: dillon shane
comment: Looks cool but I can't customise it at all I just wasted money on this

author: NAK GAMING
comment: I'm using a LG g watch r and web the watch dims, the time disappears and only shows "AM"in the center of the screen.

reply.author: kopirat
reply.content:
Hi Jason,
Try updating to the newest version, that bug should be all fixed. If not let me know and I'll push an update. Thanks!

title: Digital clock in dim mode doesn't work

author: M Roberts
comment: It would be nice if it offered the YYYY/MM/DD date-format that civilized people use.

reply.author: kopirat
reply.content: Hey, sounds good, I'll push out an update with YYYY/MM/DD tonight. Thanks!

title: Dates, yo.

author: Alex Pierce
comment: Please add more customization options like bigger digital numbers and month/day/year. One of a kind watch face and proudly support your work :)

reply.author: kopirat
reply.content: Date will be coming in an update this week, and font size settings sounds like a great idea, I'll add that in as well. Thanks for the suggestion!

title: Awesome :)

author: Austin Tinius
comment: Works great and love the style. Would you be willing to add a digital mode with the mono font you just added?

reply.author: kopirat
reply.content: Update will be out this afternoon, thanks for the suggestion!

author: julio gonzalez
comment: Just a green watch face
title: It's ok

author: JJ Gonzo
comment: Not really something special

author: Bruno De Lima
comment: Don't work

reply.author: kopirat
reply.content:
Hi Bruno,
I can definitely guarantee it does work. What problems are you having?
